page.title: 03SPORTING FACILITIES
page.content: The main facility providing recrea- tion is the Sports Centre at Gelli- galed Park, Ystrad, which cost over three-quarter of a million pounds to design and build. The swimming pool is a uniquely designed pool as far as Wales is concerned. The sauna suite is an excellent facility for those who wish to rid themselves of excess weight. The ancillary facilities such as the restaurant, lounge bar/lecture room and snack bar provide comfortable surroundings where a person can relieve a thirst or appetite. The sports catered for at the Sports Centre are many, and are as follows: Athletic Training, Badminton, Basketbll, Bowls, boxing, Cricket, Fencing, Five-a-side football, Golf, Gymnastics, Hockey-Indoor, Judo, Karate, Keepfit, League of Health and Beauty, Net Ball, Roller Skating(Cont)
